sentences.sContent: I know how busy you must be and naturally I wouldn't want to take up too much of your time.
sentences.sCn: 我知道你一定很忙，当然我不想占用你太多的时间。

sentences.sContent: A good deal of my time is taken up with driving the children to soccer games.
sentences.sCn: 我的许多时间都用在开车送孩子们去参加足球比赛。

trans.tranOther: If something takes up a particular amount of time, space, or effort, it uses that amount
